title: hotkeys dont' work when starting game
body: QWER and other keys don't work but you can hit enter and chat with them.  I have lost countless games or been set back because of this and it's my second time posting about it.  Nothing solves it outside restarting the client and even then sometimes you have to totally shut it down and log in again.

replies.body:
Hmmmmm your configuration files might not be saving correctly, which is causing you to loose all of your hotkeys altogether. Let's try forcing a manual reset on those files by following these steps. 

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

Thanks :D I tried that and if it happens again I'll post. :) :) :)

Could being alt tabbed to browse the web while the game loads cause it?  I'll watch youtube in a 2nd monitor often while the game loads but I do this almost every game until I see I spawned and then alt tab back.  Then more often than not it works, but as I get to lane/camps/invade I'll realize my QWER and other keys aren't working and have to shutdown the client and reload often losing CS/exp/being set back once I was even killed :(

Hmmmmm I know that alt-tabbing during the loading screen can sometimes mess with your connection or drivers while loading, but I don't believe it should have any effect on your hotkeys =\ . I'm glad that it sounds like you were able to get it working again though!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
This happens to me too, it has happened about 10 times. I ALT+Tab out a lot, so that would explain it. I just quit and rejoin fast as possible and it goes away.
